PORT.description: Port the Express server listens on (Railway may override this)

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB Atlas connection string - REPLACE WITH YOUR ACTUAL CONNECTION STRING

JWT_SECRET.description: Secret key for signing JWT tokens - GENERATE A SECURE RANDOM STRING (openssl rand -base64 32)

JWT_EXPIRES_IN.description: How long JWT tokens remain valid (e.g., 7d, 30d, 24h)

CORS_ORIGIN.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins - ADD AFTER DEPLOYING TO VERCEL
